MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL29 postcode area of Colwyn Bay, affecting properties in Llewelyn Road, Woodhill Road, Coed Pella Road, Queens Park and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 3:14 am. Our engineers have managed to restore supplies to a number of customers. For remaining customers, repairs are taking longer than expected because further investigations are required and as soon as we have a confirmed time for restoration of supply we will update this message again. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at  6:48 am on 19th February, 2021.
